route1.title: Lake Eola 2 Miler
route1.description: Lake Eola offers a unique urban running environment. This 2 mile route provides outstanding scenery of Lake Eola and the downtown skyline.

comment1.text: Outstanding running route! Best in Orlando.
comment1.name: John Doe

comment2.text: Crowded during the evening but a beautiful view.
comment2.name: Jane Doe

comment3.text: I don't run but this is an excellent route for walkers!
comment3.name: Anonymous
